definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Everyone feels resentment at being treated unfairly.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都會爲受到不公平的待遇而感到憤慨。

sentences.english: A decent meal and a drink afterward were not the worst way to go.
sentences.chinese: 一頓美餐然後一瓶美酒，這不算上西天的最差待遇。

sentences.english: MFN clause generally applies to the substantive problem.
sentences.chinese: 最惠國待遇條款一般適用於實體問題。

sentences.english: Second, the material of the wish to no longer limited to financial treatment.
sentences.chinese: 其二，物質性的欲不再只限於經濟待遇。

sentences.english: India has already granted MFN status to Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 印度已經給予巴基斯坦最惠國待遇。

sentences.english: Later I apologized to Hooper for his reception.
sentences.chinese: 後來爲了他受到的待遇我向胡珀道了歉。
他可能遇到可怕的殘酷待遇。

sentences.english: Prisoners are accorded the material treatment necessary in their daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯享有必要的物質生活待遇。

sentences.english: Courier and consolidator deals are long-gone, but there are other alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 導遊與特別待遇已經遠去，但還有其他是選擇。

sentences.english: All orders are packed to our customers' specifications notwithstanding the size of the order.
sentences.chinese: 所有訂單依據顧客規格包裝無論大小訂單都獲此待遇。

sentences.english: Sometimes distributors don't want to settle for equal treatment.
sentences.chinese: 有時候發行方並不希望平等待遇。

sentences.english: It provides duty-free and quota-free treatment for certain clothing and other products.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了特定服裝和其它產品免稅免配額待遇。

sentences.english: Why is it so high in the treatment?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼給它那麼高的待遇？

sentences.english: At the same time pay demands take off and inflation re-emerges.
sentences.chinese: 同時，待遇要求開始上升，通脹重新擡頭。

sentences.english: In 4, how much salary and welfare benefits of the sea crew?
sentences.chinese: 海乘人員的薪資及福利待遇如何？

definition: to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
